data.text: @AndrewChebuhar @ChiParentsAct @chicagosmayor @CTULocal1 @leighleighmw Lobbying is not the issue. The issue is access. In one of our most recent events, our school hosted a vaccination events where 34 kids got their first shot. If we want to be successful, we need to push for “Take the Vaccine to the People” ordinance. We can use help.
@ChiParentsAct @miguelfor28 @chicagosmayor @CTULocal1 @leighleighmw So lobby more parents to be responsible and vaccinate their kids.
@ChiParentsAct @chicagosmayor @CTULocal1 @leighleighmw While vaccination rates remain low - so does the outbreak of Covid in schools.
@ChiParentsAct @chicagosmayor @CTULocal1 @leighleighmw Long after this pandemic is over this will be the enduring image of the CTU and how they abused children https://t.co/Gfp52CpkQY
@ChiParentsAct @CTULocal1 @chicagosmayor @leighleighmw A few people outside with masks.  Yeah, overwhelming public support for child abuse.  Well done.
